languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад, держащийся за багряную рану в груди, бросает на вас измученный взгляд.{/n} "Подмога? Боюсь, {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}уже поздно{/d}, чтобы переломить ход событий. Но, если у тебя достанет чести, мы можем хотя бы с достоинством отдать свои жизни — за {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эдельтрад, держащийся за багряную рану в груди, бросает на вас измученный взгляд.{/n} "Подмога? Боюсь, уже поздно, чтобы переломить ход событий. Но, если у тебя достанет чести, мы можем хотя бы с достоинством отдать свои жизни — за {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}".

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad, who is clutching a bleeding wound on his chest, gives you a tormented look.{/n} "Help has arrived? {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late{/d} to change the tide, I'm afraid. But if there is any honour in you, we can at least die with dignity and give our lives for the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад, держащийся за багряную рану в груди, бросает на вас измученный взгляд.{/n} "Подмога? Боюсь, {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}уже поздно{/d}, чтобы переломить ход событий. Но, если у тебя достанет чести, мы можем хотя бы с достоинством отдать свои жизни — за {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad, who is clutching the bleeding wound on his chest, gives you a tormented look.{/n} "Help has arrived? Too late to change the tide, I'm afraid. But if there is any honour in you, we can at least die with dignity and give our lives for the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

{n}Edelthrad, who is clutching a bleeding wound on his chest, gives you a tormented look.{/n} "Help has arrived? Too late to change the tide, I'm afraid. But if there is any honour in you, we can at least die with dignity and give our lives for the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

{n}Edelthrad, who is clutching a bleeding wound on his chest, gives you a tormented look.{/n} "Help has arrived? Too late to change the tide, I'm afraid. But if there is any honour in you, we can at least die with dignity and give our lives for the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

languages.text: {n}艾德萨德捂着胸前流血的伤口，痛苦地看了你一眼。{/n}“援军终于到了吗？恐怕你们来得{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}太晚了{/d}，没法扭转局势了。不过，如果你还有颗荣誉之心的话，至少我们可以充满尊严地死去，为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}献出我们的生命。”
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad, who is clutching a bleeding wound on his chest, gives you a tormented look.{/n} "Help has arrived? {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late{/d} to change the tide, I'm afraid. But if there is any honour in you, we can at least die with dignity and give our lives for the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾德萨德捂着胸前流血的伤口，痛苦地看了你一眼。{/n}“援军终于到了吗？恐怕你们来得太晚了，没法扭转局势了。不过，如果你还有颗荣誉之心的话，至少我们可以充满尊严地死去，为{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}献出我们的生命。”

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad, que aferra una herida sangrante en su pecho, te lanza una mirada atormentada.{/n} «¿Ha llegado la caballería? {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Muy tarde{/d} para cambiar las tornas, me temo. Pero, si tiene algún rastro de honor, al menos podremos morir con dignidad y dar nuestras vidas por la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad, who is clutching a bleeding wound on his chest, gives you a tormented look.{/n} "Help has arrived? {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late{/d} to change the tide, I'm afraid. But if there is any honour in you, we can at least die with dignity and give our lives for the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad, que aferra una herida sangrante en su pecho, te lanza una mirada atormentada.{/n} «¿Ha llegado la caballería? Muy tarde para cambiar las tornas, me temo. Pero, si tiene algún rastro de honor, al menos podremos morir con dignidad y dar nuestras vidas por la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».

languages.text: {n}エデルスラドは血が流れる胸の傷を握りしめ、苦しそうな顔であなたを見る。{/n}「援軍が来たのか？残念だが、流れを変えるには{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}遅すぎた{/d}。だが、もしあなたに名誉があるなら、我々は少なくとも尊厳を持って死に、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}のために命を捧げることができる」
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad, who is clutching a bleeding wound on his chest, gives you a tormented look.{/n} "Help has arrived? {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late{/d} to change the tide, I'm afraid. But if there is any honour in you, we can at least die with dignity and give our lives for the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}エデルスラドは血が流れる胸の傷を握りしめ、苦しそうな顔であなたを見る。{/n}「援軍が来たか？残念だが、流れを変えるには遅すぎる。もしあなたに名誉があるなら、我々は少なくとも尊厳を持って死に、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}のために命を捧げることができる」
{n}エデルスラドは血が流れる胸の傷を握りしめ、苦しそうな顔であなたを見る。{/n}「援軍が来たのか？残念だが、流れを変えるには{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}遅すぎた{/d}。だが、もしあなたに名誉があるなら、我々は少なくとも尊厳を持って死に、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}のために命を捧げることができる」

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad, les mains serrées sur une plaie ensanglantée sur son torse, vous lance un regard de souffrance.{/n} « Les secours sont là ? Il est {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}trop tard{/d} pour renverser la vapeur, je le crains. Mais si vous avez le moindre honneur, nous pouvons encore mourir avec dignité et nous sacrifier pour la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad, who is clutching a bleeding wound on his chest, gives you a tormented look.{/n} "Help has arrived? {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late{/d} to change the tide, I'm afraid. But if there is any honour in you, we can at least die with dignity and give our lives for the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad, les mains serrées sur une plaie ensanglantée sur son torse, vous lance un regard de souffrance.{/n} « Les secours sont là ? Il est trop tard pour renverser la vapeur, je le crains. Mais si vous avez le moindre honneur, nous pouvons encore mourir avec dignité et nous sacrifier pour la {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}libre-marchande{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad, der eine Hand auf eine blutende Wunde auf seiner Brust presst, wirft dir einen gequälten Blick zu.{/n} "Hilfe ist eingetroffen? {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Zu spät{/d}, um das Steuer herumzureißen, fürchte ich. Aber wenn Ihr auch nur einen Hauch von Ehre besitzt, dann lasst uns in Würde sterben und unser Leben für die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} geben."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad, who is clutching a bleeding wound on his chest, gives you a tormented look.{/n} "Help has arrived? {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late{/d} to change the tide, I'm afraid. But if there is any honour in you, we can at least die with dignity and give our lives for the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad, der eine Hand auf eine blutende Wunde auf seiner Brust presst, wirft dir einen gequälten Blick zu.{/n} "Hilfe ist eingetroffen? Zu spät, um das Steuer herumzureißen, fürchte ich. Aber wenn Ihr auch nur einen Hauch von Ehre besitzt, dann lasst uns in Würde sterben und unser Leben für die {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Freihändlerin{/g} geben."

languages.text: {n}Elini göğsündeki kanayan yaraya bastıran Edelthrad, sana ızdırap dolu bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Yardım geldi mi sonunda? Maalesef gidişatı değiştirmek için {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}çok geç{/d}. Ancak içinde bir miktar da olsa şeref varsa en azından haysiyetimizle ölebilir, canlarımızı {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} uğruna feda edebiliriz."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad, who is clutching a bleeding wound on his chest, gives you a tormented look.{/n} "Help has arrived? {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_WentBack}Too late{/d} to change the tide, I'm afraid. But if there is any honour in you, we can at least die with dignity and give our lives for the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."
